attributes.action: Stop the England football team band from playing at matches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A petition to stop the band that follows the English football team from playing at matches as it is 'jinxing' the teams performance. The band represents everything that is wrong with English international football and stopping them playing would no-doubt see an immediate upturn in the fortunes of our national team.
No more Great Escape. It has now become embarrassing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
